targetLine.text: Thanks again, E, for everything. How much do I owe you for?

contextBefore.text: Although, I have doubtlessly exceeded your expectations for a single night's work the suit and device contain a few more features we need to discuss.

contextAfter.text: Pish-posh, darling. Your bill will be covered by my fee for being Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl, and Frozone's exclusive designer throughout the known universe and until the end of time. But babysitting this one I do for free, darling.
I would resist the temptation to stretch. The temperature around you is well below freezing. Try to stretch and...you'll break.
